html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-05682010-05-13,  ,  PSEP,  , 
ActFirearms Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Firearms Fees Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the FIREARMS FEES REGULATIONS, which extends the current fee waiver associated with renewing or modifying firearms licences, (which has been in place since May 2006) for an additional one-year period until May 16, 2011. These amendments, along with the Firearms Licences Regulations and the Order Declaring an Amnesty Period (2006), encourage previously lawful firearms owners to bring themselves back into compliance with federal firearms legislation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0102 Publication Date: 2010-05-26
AttachmentsAttachment
